briefTitle: Long-Term Safety of Treximet (Sumatriptan/Naproxen Sodium) for Migraine in Adolescents
officialTitle: Study TXA107977, a Long-Term Safety Study of a Combination Product Containing Sumatriptan Succinate and Naproxen Sodium for the Treatment of Migraine in Adolescents
summary: This study was designed to determine long-term safety of TREXIMET (sumatriptan/naproxen sodium) in adolescents for the acute treatment of migraine.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With the Indicated Drug-related Adverse Events
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline through End of Study (up to Month 12)
